REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2169 reute r f BC-US-WEST-<USW>-UNIT-WI 06-01 0074

TEXT.TITLE: US WEST <USW> UNIT WINS POINT-OF-SALE CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: US West Information Systems said it completed an agreement with the Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Ltd <ANZA.S> to provide a turnkey installation of hardware, software and support services for a nationwide point-of-sale network in Australia. Financial terms of the five-year agreement were not disclosed. US West Information Systems is a unit of US West Inc. Reuter
